headline.main: Canadian, Chinese Companies Sign Deal on Proposed Idaho Mine
headline.print_headline: Canadian, Chinese Companies Sign Deal on Proposed Idaho Mine

docs.snippet: A Canadian mining company has reached an agreement with a Chinese firm that will bring $700 million in financing for a possible open-pit molybdenum mine near Boise, Idaho....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Canadian mining company has reached an agreement with a Chinese firm that will bring $700 million in financing for a possible open-pit molybdenum mine near Boise, Idaho.

headline.main: Cathedral Service Starts Celebrations for British Queen's 90th Birthday
headline.print_headline: Cathedral Service Starts Celebrations for British Queen's 90th Birthday

docs.snippet: Britain holds a National Service of Thanksgiving in honor of Queen Elizabeth on Friday, kicking off a weekend of events to mark the official 90th birthday of the country's longest-reigning monarch....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain holds a National Service of Thanksgiving in honor of Queen Elizabeth on Friday, kicking off a weekend of events to mark the official 90th birthday of the country's longest-reigning monarch.

headline.main: Britain to Shed a Quarter of Its Oil Jobs Since Price Fell-Industry
headline.print_headline: Britain to Shed a Quarter of Its Oil Jobs Since Price Fell-Industry

docs.snippet: As many as 120,000 oil workers will have lost their jobs in Britain by the end of the year compared to mid-2014 when oil prices started declining and unleashed sector-wide cost cuts, the industry's lobby group said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: As many as 120,000 oil workers will have lost their jobs in Britain by the end of the year compared to mid-2014 when oil prices started declining and unleashed sector-wide cost cuts, the industry's lobby group said on Friday.

headline.main: Emails in Clinton Probe Dealt With Planned Drone Strikes: WSJ
headline.print_headline: Emails in Clinton Probe Dealt With Planned Drone Strikes: WSJ

docs.snippet: Emails between U.S. diplomats in Islamabad and State Department officials in Washington about whether to challenge specific U.S. drone strikes in Pakistan are at the center of a criminal probe involving Hillary Clinton's handling of classified inf...
docs.lead_paragraph: Emails between U.S. diplomats in Islamabad and State Department officials in Washington about whether to challenge specific U.S. drone strikes in Pakistan are at the center of a criminal probe involving Hillary Clinton's handling of classified information, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Full-Size Replica of Vatican's Sistine Chapel Opens in Mexico City
headline.print_headline: Full-Size Replica of Vatican's Sistine Chapel Opens in Mexico City

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY - People who can't make it to Rome to admire the  Sistine Chapel in Vatican City can view a full-size replica of it that opened this week in Mexico City....
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY - People who can't make it to Rome to admire the  Sistine Chapel in Vatican City can view a full-size replica of it that opened this week in Mexico City.

headline.main: For India's Surging Economy, Small Is Beautiful
headline.print_headline: For India's Surging Economy, Small Is Beautiful

docs.snippet: For Rohan Sharma, business has never been better. Sales at his autoparts company in the western Indian state of Gujarat are booming and the order book has almost doubled in the past year....
docs.lead_paragraph: For Rohan Sharma, business has never been better. Sales at his autoparts company in the western Indian state of Gujarat are booming and the order book has almost doubled in the past year.

headline.main: Richard Gere Speaks Out for the Homeless as He Presents His Latest Film 'Time Out of Mind' in Rome
headline.print_headline: Richard Gere Speaks Out for the Homeless as He Presents His Latest Film 'Time Out of Mind' in Rome

docs.snippet: Actor Richard Gere spoke out about the plight of the homeless at a news conference in Rome before a screening of his new film, "Time out of Mind," in which the actor disguises himself as a homeless man and is almost unrecognizable....
docs.lead_paragraph: Actor Richard Gere spoke out about the plight of the homeless at a news conference in Rome before a screening of his new film, "Time out of Mind," in which the actor disguises himself as a homeless man and is almost unrecognizable.

headline.main: Struggling White Sox Cut Mat Latos, Sign Justin Morneau
headline.print_headline: Struggling White Sox Cut Mat Latos, Sign Justin Morneau

docs.snippet: The struggling White Sox shook up their roster Thursday, signing veteran first baseman Justin Morneau and designating veteran right-hander Mat Latos for assignment....
docs.lead_paragraph: The struggling White Sox shook up their roster Thursday, signing veteran first baseman Justin Morneau and designating veteran right-hander Mat Latos for assignment.
